div.div: Serving the Town of Granite, we are a small rural school located in Greer County. Steeped in tradition, Granite Public Schools has received state recognition in both academics and athletics.

div.p: Through the efforts of our hard working educators, combined with the involvement of concerned parents and a supportive community, we strive to instill a strong work ethic and high standards within our students so they may thrive in their future.
